name: ConnectedThresholdImageFilter

members.name: Lower
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set Upper and Lower Threshold inputs as values

members.name: Upper
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set Upper and Lower Threshold inputs as values
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get Upper and Lower Threshold inputs as values

members.name: ReplaceValue
members.doc:
Pixels that lie within Lower and Upper (inclusive)
will be replaced with this value. The default is 1.
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get value to replace thresholded pixels. Pixels that lie * within Lower and Upper (inclusive) will be replaced with this value. The default is 1.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get value to replace thresholded pixels. Pixels that lie * within Lower and Upper (inclusive) will be replaced with this value. The default is 1.

settings.comment: /* JAVA does not implicitly cast ints to short */

briefdescription: Label pixels that are connected to a seed and lie within a range of values.
detaileddescription: ConnectedThresholdImageFilterlabels pixels with ReplaceValue that are connected to an initial Seed AND lie within a Lower and Upper threshold range.
